document.full_text: amazon, the maker of the kindle e-book reader, said it would reverse its policy and allow the device's users to borrow e-books from public libraries later this year.
document.title: kindle users to be able to borrow library e-books
lines_and_colors: amazon, the maker of the kindle e-book reader, said it would reverse its policy and allow the device's users to borrow e-books from public libraries later this year.
